## ResourceTools.ResourceDetailData.candidates property

Array of all candidates with their conditions and values

**Signature:**

```typescript
candidates: Array<{
        json: JsonValue;
        conditions: Array<{
            qualifier: string;
            operator: string;
            value: string;
            priority: number;
            scoreAsDefault?: number;
        }>;
        isPartial: boolean;

    }>;
```
